title: Implement system monitoring and metrics

summary.description: Implemented comprehensive enterprise-grade monitoring system for RIF with real-time metrics, multi-channel alerting, and web dashboard
summary.approach: Multi-dimensional monitoring with file-based storage and shadow mode integration
summary.outcome: Production-ready monitoring system exceeding all performance and reliability targets

technical_achievements.significance: Enables production monitoring without performance impact

technical_achievements.details: GitHub, logs, console with intelligent throttling

quality_gates.details: All performance targets exceeded by significant margins
